short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces the word 'curation' with 'ad network' on all webpages. Now with a toggle switch.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ad Tech loves a new Buzz word, but lets be honest - Curation is just an Ad Network rebranded. 

It's not even like the shift to Deal ID bundling is new. The Ad Nets have been doing that for years.

So why not simplify, reset and create the mental capacity needed to focus on actual new trends across our incredible industry. 

With this extension you can automatically change every single use of the word 'curation' back to 'ad network' automatically.
